data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bolama, Guinea-Bissau to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bolama, Guinea-Bissau

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 626 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 48 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Bolama. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 30,100 citizens of Bolama, Guinea-Bissau, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Nalu people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 626 believers in Bolama, Guinea-Bissau a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 626 believers in Bolama and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Bolama, Guinea-Bissau.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Bolama
location.people_groups_list: Papel, Mankanya, Balanta, Kentohe, Nalu, Biafada
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Papel (174,000), Mankanya (56,000), Balanta, Kentohe (392,000), Nalu (11,000), Biafada (57,000)
